member.name: ITfClientId.GetClientId
member.summary: Obtains a client identifier for a CLSID.
member.param: CLSID to obtain the client identifier for.
Pointer to a TfClientId value that receives the client identifier.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfClientId
member.summary: The ITfClientId interface is implemented by the TSF manager. This interface is used to obtain a client identifier for TSF objects. An instance of this interface is obtained by querying the thread manager with IID_ITfClientId.
